022import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
023import static org.mockito.Mockito.mock;
024import static org.mockito.Mockito.when;
025
026import java.util.Vector;
027
028import javax.servlet.ServletConfig;
029import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
030import javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
031
032import org.apache.turbine.Turbine;
033import org.apache.turbine.TurbineConstants;
034import org.apache.turbine.test.BaseTestCase;
035import org.apache.turbine.util.RunData;
036import org.apache.turbine.util.TurbineConfig;
037import org.apache.turbine.util.uri.URIConstants;
038import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterAll;
039import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeAll;
040import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
041import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
042
043/**
044 * Tests TurbinePipeline.
045 *
046 * @author <a href="mailto:epugh@opensourceConnections.com">Eric Pugh</a>
047 * @author <a href="mailto:peter@courcoux.biz">Peter Courcoux</a>
048 * @version $Id: DefaultSessionTimeoutValveTest.java 1606111 2014-06-27
049 *          14:46:47Z gk $
050 * @deprecated DefaultSessionTimeoutValve is deprecated
051 */
052@Deprecated
053public class DefaultSessionTimeoutValveTest extends BaseTestCase
054{
055    private static TurbineConfig tc = null;
056    private ServletConfig config = null;
057    private HttpServletRequest request = null;
058    private HttpServletResponse response = null;
059
060    @BeforeAll
061    public static void init()
062    {
063        tc = new TurbineConfig(
064                ".",
065                "/conf/test/CompleteTurbineResources.properties");
066        tc.initialize();
067    }
068
069    @BeforeEach
070    public void setUpBefore() throws Exception
071    {
072        config = mock(ServletConfig.class);
073        request = getMockRequest();
074        response = mock(HttpServletResponse.class);
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * Tests the Valve.
079     */
080    @Test
081    public void testDefaults() throws Exception
082    {
083        // reset
084        Turbine.getConfiguration().setProperty(TurbineConstants.SESSION_TIMEOUT_KEY,
085                Integer.valueOf(TurbineConstants.SESSION_TIMEOUT_DEFAULT));
086
087        Vector<String> v = new Vector<>();
088        v.add(URIConstants.CGI_ACTION_PARAM);
089        when(request.getParameterNames()).thenReturn(v.elements());
090        when(request.getParameterValues(URIConstants.CGI_ACTION_PARAM)).thenReturn(new String[] { "TestAction" });
091
092        PipelineData pipelineData = getPipelineData(request, response, config);
093
094        Pipeline pipeline = new TurbinePipeline();
095
096        DefaultSessionTimeoutValve valve = new DefaultSessionTimeoutValve();
097        pipeline.addValve(valve);
098        pipeline.initialize();
099
100        pipeline.invoke(pipelineData);
101
102        RunData runData = (RunData) pipelineData;
103        assertEquals(0, runData.getSession().getMaxInactiveInterval());
104    }
105
106    /**
107     * Tests the Valve.
108     */
109    @Test
110    public void testTimeoutSet() throws Exception
111    {
112        Turbine.getConfiguration().setProperty(TurbineConstants.SESSION_TIMEOUT_KEY, "3600");
113        PipelineData pipelineData = getPipelineData(request, response, config);
114
115        Pipeline pipeline = new TurbinePipeline();
116
117        DefaultSessionTimeoutValve valve = new DefaultSessionTimeoutValve();
118        pipeline.addValve(valve);
119        pipeline.initialize();
120
121        pipeline.invoke(pipelineData);
122        RunData runData = (RunData) pipelineData;
123
124        assertEquals(3600, runData.getSession().getMaxInactiveInterval());
125    }
126
127    @AfterAll
128    public static void destroy()
129    {
130        tc.dispose();
131    }
132
133}
